Title: Long live the great leader Chairman Mao! -- Chairman Mao delivers a report to cadres in Yan'an, 1941
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Colored version of a black-and-white photograph taken in Yan'an. According to the National Art Museum of China, Beijing, Mao is speeching to the cadres of the 120th Division in 1942, not 1941 as the poster states.
